"use client"; import { useState } from "react"; import { Dialog, DialogContent, DialogHeader, DialogTitle, } from "@/components/ui/dialog"; import { Button } from "@/components/ui/button"; import { Label } from "@/components/ui/label"; import { Separator } from "@/components/ui/separator"; import { Badge } from "@/components/ui/badge"; import { Receipt, FileText, Settings, Save } from "lucide-react"; export function ReceiptConfigDialog({ open, onOpenChange, config, onSave }) { const [receiptConfig, setReceiptConfig] = useState(config); const handleSave = () => { onSave(receiptConfig); onOpenChange(false); }; const updateRolePermission = (role: string, field: string, value: any) => { setReceiptConfig((prev) => ({ ...prev, rolePermissions: { ...prev.rolePermissions, [role]: { ...prev.rolePermissions[role], [field]: value, }, }, })); }; const roles = [ { id: "caixa", name: "Operador de Caixa" }, { id: "fiscal", name: "Fiscal" }, { id: "supervisor", name: "Supervisor" }, { id: "gerente", name: "Gerente" }, { id: "admin", name: "Administrador" }, ]; return ( Configuração de Cupons e Recibos

setReceiptConfig((prev) => ({ ...prev, enableFiscalCoupon: e.target.checked, })) } />
